changes.description: First blueprint version ðŸŽ‰
Fix an issue which prevented creating automations for ZHA or deCONZ.
Update example and fix an issue which executed actions twice when the remote was connected via Zigbee2MQTT.
Add support for virtual double press events.
Block automation runs for empty and repeated messages.
Reduce input_text helper writes.
Move the blueprint into the Controllers-Hooks Ecosystem.
Add example for fully controlling an RGB light (Thanks [@kks36](https://github.com/kks36)!).

Standardize input names across all the Controller blueprints. If you plan to update this blueprint, please update the inputs in your automations as follows:
- `remote` -> `controller_device`
- `zigbee2mqtt_remote` -> `controller_entity`
- `action_* inputs` -> `action_button_*`
- `helper_last_loop_event_input` -> `helper_last_controller_event`
Add support for the Cover Hook.
Fix event mappings for ZHA and deCONZ.
Fix double press events not being detected with deCONZ.
Fix deCONZ events not being recognized.
Make `helper_last_controller_event` a mandatory input to simplify setup and enable future advanced features. When updating, ensure to provide a dedicated input_text entity for this input.
ðŸŽ‰ Add Debouncing support to avoid duplicate action runs.
Prevent undesired endless loops by running loop actions a finite number of times, customizable with new blueprint inputs.
Fix inputs wrongly marked as required.
Fix Zigbee2MQTT reporting null state changes.
Fix deCONZ button release events not being properly recognized.
Improve inputs documentation and organization.
Standardize blueprints structure and inputs naming across the collection. Improve blueprint documentation.
Optimize characters usage for the `helper_last_controller_event` text input.
Fix double press events not triggered due to changes in Home Assistant 2023.5.x. (Thanks [@ZtormTheCat](https://github.com/ZtormTheCat))

Migrate to Zigbee2MQTT MQTT Device Triggers. The `controller_entity` input is deprecated and `controller_device` is now mandatory. Remove `controller_entity` from your automation and configure the `controller_device` input with your controller device ID. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
Standardize input naming format for controller devices and virtual button actions. No functionality changes.
Fix double-click detection logic. (Thanks [@danleongjy](https://github.com/danleongjy))
Improve Last Controller Event Helper JSON Regex with more lenient matching.
